name: Baba Fumika
intro: Gravure magazines since she was featured there often back in 2015
description: That rack, dude. And her acting ain't half bad considering she isn't that into gravure and is a regular at local TV dramas now. Often, just once a while, I'll watch Japanese drama without subtitles because of her. Sometimes. Her introvert personality[3] is also a turn-on for me somehow, once you see how she reacts outside of drama. She has her own apparel brand now, in case you wonder what she is a model for these days.
comments: [1]She is more commonly referred to as Fumi-chan
[2]She did sing a song before for a producer and it wasn't bad, see{this music video}
[3]As mentioned in her photobook interview,{which I reviewed (and translated)}

name: Hasegawa Kasumi
intro: From mini web series "Oretachi no Aza-su"as Kasumi
description: The glasses and her acting in the mini web series featuring the main guy's perspective with her in various situations definitely kickstarted this trend. With a variety of talents including being involved in mainstream TV drama and doing cosplaying for the role here and there, I feel like I barely knew about her despite her appeal rubbing off on me.

name: Tachibana Haru
intro: From mobile game "Alternative Girls"official livestream series "OruKomi"
description: I can't say I want to f**k her, but she'll never hear of that haha. She'll make a good girlfriend though, as conflicting as we may be in personality maybe I should stop doing dumb things on her livestreams? (>w<) Nowadays she also hosts events for video games and plays some of them herself since she is a regular Twitch streamer, apart from occasional cosplays and modelling here and there.
comments: [1]Fans inferred her age from when she graduated from university in 2017, also revealed afterwards in her modelpress interviews
[2]I reviewed her 3rd photobook and her final for Comiket

name: marupi
comments: [1]It took her a year of appearing on gravure magazines before she got her 1st photobook, shot in Thailand

name: Hanazawa Kana
intro: From Anime "OreImo"as Kuroneko and in "Kannagi"as Zange-chan
description: Kana-chan has been in so many roles, you're weird if you didn't like her because of one of them. Her outside of Anime is kinda quirky, obsessed with bread[3] more than anyone else, and super lovely. Just count how many roles of cute girls she has voiced and you'll get the gist.
comments: [1]The closest she has come to it was wearing one, specifically just the top with a shirt above, on her 400th episode of her radio program. And maybe when{she showed off her back} on a Tweet a year later
[2]Married to fellow voice actor Oono Kensho, and known to be dating 3 years prior to announcement in July 2020
[3]She is high about bread you thought she is into drugs, as seen on{a Tweet from her radio show}

name: Hikasa Youko
intro: From Anime "K-ON!"as Akiyama Mio, "Seitokai Yakuindomo"as Amakusa Shino, and later in her solo music career
description: I liked her voice a lot thanks to Anime "K-ON!",but also because of that do I get exposed to how sociable and friendly she is, and how her reputation was portrayed by others[3] in front of the camera. She has appeared in more Anime than you know of though, she is the veteran after all.
comments: [1]More commonly referred to as "Hiyocchi"
[2]Brief solo music career under music label PONY CANYON from 2013 to 2014, releasing 4 singles and 1 album; First single was ending theme for Anime "Attack on Titan"

[3]Ever since her performance in Anime series "WORKING!!"she has been regarded as an "old hag"by fellow voice actor Nakamura Yuuichi as during the recording the director praised on voicing Takanashi Izumi, a lazy and weak woman in her 30s

name: Horie Yui
intro: From Anime "Love Hina"as Narusegawa Naru and "Toradora!"as Kushieda Minori
description: On camera she exudes a very friendly and kind personality (for her age), and technically her face is still attractive to me (for her age), compared to voice actresses around her generation. She has a unique voice which makes her excel in singing and voice acting, being one of the most popular actresses in the 2000s.
comments: [1]As stated by her as a farce of concealing her age so she is always 17, but we know... Okay I'm going to reveal it, you ready? It's 1976
[2]Has she ever? More like, do we want it now? She did release a ton of photobooks over the years when she was... still... young haha

name: Kayano Ai
intro: Because she's cute? And later from Anime "Hyouka"as Ibara Mayaka and Anime "Servant x Service"as Yamagami Lucy
description: She is one of the first few who I followed before seeing them in Anime because she looks cute back in the day, and subsequently I've came to love her soft voice acting and singing. Her hosting that alcohol-drinking YouTube series[3] is just a bonus to see her talk about what she likes.
comments: [1]She released her first original mini-album for her 10th anniversary as a voice actress, under Aniplex
[1]She has released several photobooks without swimsuits, including one for her 10th anniversary as a voice actress
[3]Titled "{Kayanomi}",on YouTube

name: Komatsu Mikako
intro: From Anime "Kamisama Inai no Nichiyoubi"as Princess Ulla Eulesse Hecmatika, and from the Anime's ending theme song
description: She must be the perfect girl next door; From early days posting selfies on Twitter[3] to her music career to her in front of the camera, she has all the talent and appeal. In Anime she performs well too, but we know her real talent is in her singing that is greatly appreciated by music producers group Q-MHz.
comments: [1]Initially under KING AMUSEMENT CREATIVE (formerly King Records); Now under TOYS' FACTORY produced under music producers groupp Q-MHz
[2]To fellow voice actor Maeno Tomoaki
[3]Here's an example of what she posted on Twitter on{Valentine's Day}

name: Kotobuki Minako
intro: From Anime "K-ON!"as Kotobuki Tsumugi and later in "A-Channel"as Yuuko
description: Having a distinctive lovely voice, she has starred in many roles that will make an impression. Her music career has also been loved by me over the years. Her half-naked in photobooks and having her own YouTube channel[3] is just a bonus.
comments: [1]Under music label and talent agency MusicRay'n since 2009

[2]Similar to her fellow group member Tomatsu Haruka, she has released some spectacular shots to bewilder; I have however reviewed her photobook calendar of when she was studying in London for a year and a half
[3]Due to her studying overseas in England from April 2020 to December 2021; YouTube videos{where you can see her without makeup} (CANNOT UNSEE WARNING but I like)

name: Ookubo Rumi
intro: Because she's cute, and from Anime "Servant x Service"as Ichimiya Touko
description: She started me with the perfect tsundere[2] voice acting[3] and a really adorable face (for her age), she is to be loved for everything she has to offer. She remains cute and lively in front of the camera, and that is all I have wanted back in the day. Today her is still active in Anime, seeing her even once in a while has not dampened my feelings for this lady.
comments: [1]She has only released one photobook so far, cosplaying different roles from her magazine serialization "Illumination Closet"
[2]Hot-cold personality specifically towards love
[3]Characters she voiced that got me were from Anime "Servant x Service"and also Anime"Acchi Kocchi"as Miniwa Tsumiki

name: Satou Satomi
intro: From Anime "K-ON!"as Tainaka Ritsu, and later in "Seitokai Yakuindomo"as Shichijou Aria
description: Hyper voice Satomi-chan is the best, whether it is from Anime or from her solo music career. Nobody comes close in this aspect of her and I love her for this. Outside of her work she has a overly kind yet wild personality leaking out of her we might see once in a while.
comments: [1]Commonly referred to as "Shugami"because of her name containing "sugar"twice
[2]Under music label KING AMUSEMENT CREATIVE (formerly King Records) from 2014 to 2017, releasing 3 singles and 2 albums
[3]Married to fellow voice actor Terashima Takuma

name: Taketatsu Ayana
intro: From Anime "K-ON!"as Nakano Azusa and later in Anime "OreImo"as Kousaka Kirino
description: I wish I could point out more bad stuff about this super popular voice actress[3] but apart from her less than skilled singing (which I beg to differ) everything about her is great, inside and outside of Anime. And she has quite a rack too. You don't need her Anime roles with this real life equivalent.
comments: [1]Technically yes in her 2nd photobook with a thin shirt, and later in an{event-only photobook} as promoted by her on Twitter
[2]Married to fellow voice actor Kaji Yuki
[3]She is one of the first who grew quickly to 1 million Twitter followers as a voice actress in Japan

name: Tomatsu Haruka
intro: From Anime "Kannagi"as Nagi, idol group "sphere"and later in her countless roles in Anime
description: She is real perfect all around from looks to talent to her personality despite having a slender figure. Over the years, the roles she starred in Anime are diverse yet professionally voiced, giving me every opportunity to fall in love with her time and again as she takes on more roles. I secretly want to switch my same year elder sister with her.
comments: [1]Also referred to as "Haru-chan"by other members in idol group "sphere"
[2]Under music label and talent agency MusicRay'n since 2008, notable for theme songs for Anime series "Sword Art Online"

[3]Probably highest amount of appearances in photobooks half-naked among all the voice actresses mentioned here, to the extent of underwear even, though I would argue voice actresses these days might have gone further than her

name: Toyosaki Aki
intro: From Anime "K-ON!"as Hirasawa Yui and "Hatsukoi Limited."as Bessho Koyoi
description: You'll know her when she appears in Anime[2] (arguably over Hanazawa Kana), and I have loved her everything[3] for the duration of her solo music career before she was married. Today her is still my definition of cute, being jovial and lovely as a veteran in the industry with many roles under her belt.
comments: [1]Under music label and talent agency MusicRay'n since 2009
[2]The first exception to this was from Anime "Fractale"when she voiced a matured woman and was totally different from her usual voice. It threw me off the wall and beyond but I liked it too
[3]As in the 14/15 singles and 4/4 albums on my shelf from 2009 to 2017. Don't mind her height though, being tall wasn't her choice; Although I would argue I am too so we are a perfect fit

name: Yuuki Aoi
intro: From Anime "A Channel"as Tooru, and with{Taketatsu Ayana} in idol unit "petit milady"
description: Being a master and child prodigy in voice acting[3], she voices a myriad of roles from where you will least expect her[4], and her age is totally not reflective of her easy-going personality and cute appearance. My love for her grew slowly but surely over the years and today she deserves my utmost respect of producing her own comic series "Chimera Project".
comments: [1]More commonly referred to as "Ao-chan",though I would like to call her -sensei at this point
[2]Part of idol pop duo "petit milady"with{Taketatsu Ayana}, her solo singer career started with music label Flying Dog from 2012, moved to Nippon Columbia in 2017
[3]She was main in the original AND remake of Anime "Kino no Tabi",premiered on 2003.04.08 and 2017.10.06 respectively
[4]Her voice acting ranges from voicing Otus Lotta in Anime "ACCA"(cute) to Hanatabake Yoshiko in "Aho Girl"(crazy) to Takagi Megumi in "Sangatsu no Lion"(cool) all aired in 2017

name: Amamiya Sora
intro: From Anime "Isshukan Friends."as Fujimiya Kaori
description: She's that same year wife I want but cannot get, to be frank. She is well-mannered and rather serious in front of the camera, but she is cute, sometimes emotional and even sadistic within it makes her fellow group members from TrySail scared. If you feel that you are in a different level with her, you are not alone.
comments: [1]Because her name can be pronounced as "Sora"and "{Ten}"in Japanese
[2]Under music label and talent agency MusicRay'n since 2014
[3]I doubt we'll ever see it to be honest, as much as I would love to. But I'll take as many shots this attractive woman can come up with as I can, for example the one photobook which I reviewed

name: Asakura Momo
intro: From her idol group "TrySail"and later in Anime "WWW.WORKING!!"as Yanagiba Miri and "PriPri Chii-chan"as Yuuka
description: I just want her as a friend who will light up my life, make me a genius (because sometimes she isn't[3]), and I want to cuddle her every day after work just because I think she could use some too. Life-sized bolsters have nothing on this woman. Inside of Anime her voice does stand out, sadly rare in appearance and underrated in talent thanks to the crowded voice acting industry.
comments: [1]Under music label and talent agency MusicRay'n since 2016
[2]I'll call her 1st photobook technically it even though it's under a thin shirt

[3]YouTube has clips about how she flubs on livestreams and sometimes can't control her own desires for food even in front of the camera, and how she screws up things when she is live with her fellow idol unit TrySail members

name: Endou Yurika
intro: From Game "Alternative Girls"as Mizushima Airi
description: She has a fashion style one would be proud of dating, and she has a lovely personality and voice. Even though I've only heard her from that one mobile game, but what else is not to like about her?
comments: [1]Retired as of 2018 due to health reasons; Passed on her active roles to others eg. Mizushima Airi to Waki Azumi, Anime series "BanG Dream!"born music group "Roselia"was also restructured due to her departure
[2]Under music label PONY CANYON, from 2014 to 2018

name: Hidaka Rina
intro: Because she looks cute and sounds like it too, and later from Anime "Servant x Service"as Momoi Kanon
description: She's the cute girl type that everyone loves, but I just think she looks cute even after all these years I've known her. Later on I also found out she has a lovely personality too[4] so that's a plus. Our paths hardly cross in Anime even if she has been around way longer than many mentioned here.
comments: [1]More commonly referred to as "ChanRina"for some reason I don't know, but it is associated to how fellow seiyuu called her as such
[2]She has however appeared in gravure magazines twice, making you wonder where on Earth is that photobook drop
[3]Married to voice actor Uchida Yuuma, brother to Uchida Maaya
[4]As seen from Internet video series "Ohisamagumi"with{Hikasa Youko}

name: Kouno Marika
intro: From Anime "Sore ga Seiyuu!"as Kohara Rin and later in Game "Alternative Girls"as Onitsuka Chiho
description: Initially it was due to seeing her grow over the years since her first starring role in Anime, and thanks to my friend who got interested in her, I've grown more interested in her than ever before probably over my friend at this point. Her sexy levels may be too much to handle[3] even with her adorable personality.
comments: [1]Member of idol unit "Earphones"born from Anime "Sore ga Seiyuu!"with{Takahashi Rie} and Nagaku Yuki; Solo music career under music label Nippon Columbia from 2021 to 2022
[2]She technically did not appear half-naked in her 1st photobook despite the bath dip, as mentioned in the interview
[3]Try her (old) Instagram account and you'll realize how one can be sexy without being half-naked

name: Minase Inori
intro: From Anime "Sora no Method"as Noel, and later from her solo 2nd single[3] and Anime "Tsurezure Children"as Takano Chizuru
description: Her singing voice has been impeccable ever since I gave her solo music career a chance, she is popular amongst production and fans, she is the definition of cute to many including me, and she has a very real yet loving personality in front of the camera, it's hard not to like her. Inside of Anime, I'll be smiling every time she voices characters who are as cute as her.
comments: [1]Under music label KING AMUSEMENT CREATIVE since 2015; I reviewed her single in 2020 after half a year's deliberation

[2]She has till date, mind you, never independently released a full photobook of any sort in her career thus far which is a rarity since many will have done so from a magazine serialisation and she has one
[3]{The music video of "harmony ribbon"} is on YouTube

name: Natsukawa Shiina
intro: Probably from Anime "Sora no Method"as Komiya Nonoka, and then from idol group TrySail and Anime "Demi-chan wa Kataritai"as Kusakabe Yuki
description: From her lovely voice to that super adorable face to that fantastic cry when she sings... She is the perfect video game-loving younger sister I have always wanted. Period. A Japanese voice actress who plays video games on YouTube[3]? What more can I ask? She may not have many roles in Anime that I know but her image to be still shines through the light.
comments: [1]More commonly called "Nansu",and her name Shi-i-na coincides with the number "417"in which her "Shiina Day"event has been a yearly occasion
[2]She is more literary than we think, with her 1st photobook which I reviewed eventually getting its own novel serialization written by yours truly

[3]Initially she was in gaming site Famitsu on a monthly column, and now she does{YouTube gameplays on their official channel} with games from Resident Evil to that{Harvest Moon remake} which I bought the Japanese version and played because of her instead of waiting for the English version to come out half a year later

name: Numakura Manami
intro: From Anime "Dagashi Kashi"as Endou Saya, and later from her solo music career[1]
description: Her voice acting in a variety of roles over the years fascinated me, I couldn't forget about her. Add in her powerful singing voice and she is formidable. Her personality on camera is lovely too, probably more memorable than I could imagine.
comments: [1]Under music label "Flying Dog"from 2016 to 2020; Her 2nd single "{Climber's High}"for Anime "Fuuka"is her most popular song
[2]Married to fellow voice actor Osaka Ryouta

name: Tachibana Rika
intro: From Game "Alternative Girls"as Meya and its official livestream series "OruKomi"as a regular
description: Her bubbly personality in front of the camera is a rarity even with her late entry to the industry, and she has been lovely all around ever since. Anime roles not included in this judgement since we hardly cross paths anyway.
comments: [1]Under music label Rokkan Music (under Teichiku Entertainment) from 2018 to 2020
[2]She did release two photobook without her half-naked and that kind of explains her age in my opinion

name: Takahashi Rie
intro: From Anime "Sore ga Seiyuu!"as Ichinose Futaba, and later in "Karakai Jouzu no Takagi-san"as Takagi
description: Her jovial personality outside of Anime makes me smile, and with her appearances in Anime live events and in her own cooking livestream[2] makes her a popular girl all around. Naturally, I'm drawn to her appealing character.
comments: [1]Part of idol unit "Earphones"born from Anime "Sore ga Seiyuu!"with{Kouno Marika} and Nagaku Yuki; Solo music career under music label A-Sketch since June 2021

[2]She hosted her own livestream series sponsored by an online cooking website Cookpad where she makes her own dishes, as much as she isn't good at it initially. Today this might just be one of her known hobbies as seen from her Tweets.

name: Touyama Nao
intro: From Anime "KONOBI"as Imari Maria, and later from her 2nd solo single[1]
description: Inside of Anime, she has a rather distinctive cute voice that is easy to recognize, regardless of her role. Outside of Anime though, she does have a matured yet adorable image and all, after getting into her singing and voice acting I've never said no to her activities ever since.
comments: [1]Under music label "Flying Dog"since 2017;{Music video preview} on YouTube, for Anime "Tsuki ga Kirei"
[2]She may be too cute to have such a photobook, or even have one...? Unless you want to regard those fanclub magazines or that voice acting 10th anniversary photobook as one

name: Uesaka Sumire
intro: From Anime "KONOBI"as Colette and Game "Alternative Girls"as Hiiragi Tsumugi
description: Her obvious rack drew me in, and everything from her super cute voice acting[3] to her somewhat weak singing in her solo music career (to her love of Russia maybe) to her rather clumsy yet wild personality, it's all part of her fan package. The ridiculously high amount of images she posts weekly on social media are easily motivational fuel.
comments: [1]Under music label KING AMUSEMENT CREATIVE since 2013
[2]Refer to her photobook from 2019 which I reviewed for shots that will blow your mind, and if that is not enough her later ones will make you satisfied no matter what
[3]I rather prefer when she uses her own voice or her being matured, such as from Anime "Aho Girl"as Morals Council Chairperson

name: Anzai Chika
intro: From Game "Alternative Girls"as Tendou Machi, and later in Anime "Araburu Kisetsu no Otome Domo yo."as Sugawara Niina
description: She may look normal in every aspect, but from her matured look to her jovial personality, she brings about a very friendly aura and will totally make of a lovely drinking partner provided if you can pay for her drinks. I am not so much into her though, to be honest. Maybe I should hang out in her YouTube channel more often.
comments: [1]She released a photobook for her 10th year as a voice actress, and I reviewed it. Do wet shirts count?

name: Fuchigami Mai
intro: From Game "Alternative Girls"as Sylvia Richter and later from Anime "Assassination Classroom"as Shiota Nagisa
description: She is known for acting male characters, but it's when she voices females that shows out her best, in my opinion. Outside of Anime, she don't look half bad either. Her singing career[2] is really helping me to improve her feminine image.
comments: [1]More commonly referred to as "MaiMai",but I do not want to confuse her with{Kanno Mai} so I do not refer to her by that
[2]Under music label Lantis form 2018 to 2024, most notably was "{BLACK CAT}"where in the music video she dressed up as a cat girl

name: Hondo Kaede
intro: From Anime "Demi-chan wa Kataritai"as Takanashi Hikari, and later in Game "Alternative Girls"as Kira Sayuri
description: She is in the level of adorable that everyone will love in Anime, making her super popular around 2017 that somewhat calmed down. Outside of Anime, she has an active personality and shows way too much enthusiasm in her job[3], making her more/less relatable than ever[4], compensating for her (slight) imperfections in image.
comments: [1]Pronounced as "A-dey-chan",a short form of her name Ka-e-de
[2]She has released her 1st photobook stating from its title that it did not involve her voice acting skills, and had a hair length change to relate to her hometown when she was a short-haired kid

[3]A common example of that was when she dressed up to the extent of even making custom merchandise for the characters she voices, as seen from "Demi-chan"event where she shows up as casual look Hikari and in "Alternative Girls"livestream series where she shows up in the T-shirt worn by her character that has never been released as official goods

[4]For me, that means she can converse with Anime fans as much as possible, but that also means that everything must be related to her job, as seen from an episode of "Takanishiya"where Takahashi Minami asked her to hang out privately and she thought it was for work

name: Isobe Karin
intro: From Anime "Just Because!"as Natsume Mio and later in Game "IDOLMASTER:Shiny Colors"as Tsukioka Kogane
description: Once you realise who she is behind Anime and know how lovely she is beyond everything else, you will not stop liking her, just like I did. She just needs more Anime roles though; being in video games, reticals and idol units over the years may not give her quite enough experience.
comments: [1]More commonly referred to as "Karirin"but "Karin-chan"is also popular
[2]Was part of five-member idol group BlooDye and four-member idol group Healer Girls

[3]I have reviewed her 1st photobook with swimsuits and even lingerie to please, we don't deserve this much from her in my opinion; She has since appeared in gravure magazines with more and more shots to please

name: Kido Ibuki
intro: From Anime "Subete ga F ni Naru"as Magata Shiki, but later Game "Alternative Girls"as Saionji Rei and Anime "Eromanga-sensei"as Megumi
description: Her tsundere voices are my fuel, and she is kind of cute. Despite her young age in the industry she excels in her roles and has a somewhat sloppy character and I like her for that somehow.
comments: [1]People like to call her "Ibuking"I don't know; That's how she came up with her Twitter account name, I guess
[2]Was part of idol group "everying!"with Yamasaki Erii
[3]"Adult Ibuki-chan"was her 2nd photobook title, so I should thank her for fulfilling this; I reviewed her 1st photobook without swimsuits which got a remaster the following year

name: Kitou Akari
intro: From Anime "Blend.S"as Hinata Kaho and Anime "Tsurezure Children"as Ijima Kana
description: Her voice acting might be overrated by me, but her embarrassment and professionalism drew me in. Somehow her fear of horror amongst many things about her gives me a vibe unlike her rather jovial personality and genius talent[3]. The singing just makes her perfect girlfriend candidate now.
comments: [1]Under music label PONY CANYON since 2019 where I reviewed her debut single
[2]Her self-produced photobook was the first time she wore a swimsuit in her life according to her; I did review her very 1st photobook and if you want to marry her that bad, you are welcome
[3]She was a part-time illustrator before she became a voice actor, and she explained on TV how easy it was to draw AND study during high school

name: Koga Aoi
intro: From Anime "Kaguya-sama wa Kokurasetai"as Shinomiya Kaguya
description: She is that friend's friend one will like over time, for her shy yet friendly personality makes her an adorable friend to hang out with. Coming from a poorer background, she is also thankful for her career as a rather popular voice actress today. In Anime, she has a slight corase voice one would recognize easily though casting in a variety of roles.
comments: [1]Though referred to by{Kohara Konomi} as "Ao-chan",I do not call her that as to not confuse her with{Yuuki Aoi}
[2]I reviewed her 1st photobook and I don't think I need swimsuits anymore since I got to date her

name: Kohara Konomi
intro: From Anime "Asobi Asobase"as Nomura Kasumi and earlier in Anime "Tsuki ga Kirei"as Mizuno Akane
description: She may have a temper, she may not be the cutest girl out there, but she is presenting herself as honest and as beautiful she can and I applaud her for that. Which also makes me like her that much more when she is in every cute role[2] of every other Anime while still being so herself in real life.
comments: [1]I have reviewed her more artistic 1st photobook without swimsuits though, and looks like she is only into the art of not being half-naked just like{her photographer friend} is
[2]Most notable I've seen include Anime "Takagi-san"as Mina-chan and "Kaguya-sama"as Fujiwara Chika, commonly referred to her as "dumb girl"roles

name: Lynn
intro: From Anime "Demi-chan wa Kataritai"as Takanashi Himari and later in Anime "Just Because!"as Komiya Ena
description: Besides being uniquely Western in appearance (mix between American and Japanese), she is totally Japanese has a really nice voice that leaves an impression despite not being in the spotlight. Over the years I just happen to remember her name and how well she performs every time I fail to notice her voice. Outside of Anime is where she totally shines, being a lot more jovial and easy-going than others[2]. Her bets on horse racing in Japan has also gotten her popular over time, appearing in newspapers and TV shows.
comments: [1]If her and Okinawa aren't your friends yet, you have to see my ogling on her 1st photobook

[2]See her{Resident Evil gameplay} on her talent company's official YouTube channel, where she dressed up as a teacher ready to "teach them zombies a lesson"; She also hosts a midnight radio show where she did impressions from fan mail

name: Nagae Rika
intro: From Anime "Asobi Asobase"as Olivia and earlier in "PriPri Chii-chan"as Joe-kun
description: She's that cute wife candidate we all want. She is entertaining in front of the camera[4], loves to talk to her fans and she loves cooking too, so that's a plus. Sadly she isn't that interested in guys(?) where it really seems so and I'm not sure why but let's not think too deep into it, yes?
comments: [1]According to her pinned Instagram story, the nickname exists in Hiragana and Katakana forms, and they represent intimate and casual forms respectively. Fans usually refer to her Katakana nickname.
[2]As leaked by a news article which quickly removed the birth year, surprisingly younger than I thought
[3]I have though, done a review of her 1st photobook which has shots to please you don't need a swimsuit
[4]Her current web radio series "17 Changes"tests her memory, intelligence, her voice impressions and so much more in 17 distinct mini-segments, which is very entertaining in my opinion

name: Nagatsuma Juuri
intro: From Game "Alternative Girls"as Agatsuma Ren
description: She has the best overall package to love, and in her first impression to me she voiced someone who is desperate to love. What else can I ask for? Outside of voice acting she has a friendly personality, though not much is known about her even after all these years. Her weekly blog post on Sundays is a good indicator of her recent activities.
comments: [1]Thanks to one Muscle Miyazaki from Game "Alternative Girls"livestream series I can't forget this now lol
[2]Released two singles under retired music label ZERO-A, but you should have heard{her self-composed character song} in the only game I know of her

name: Omigawa Chiaki
intro: From Anime "Seitokai Yakuindomo"as Mitsuba Mutsumi, and later in Anime "Bungou Stray Dogs"as Tanizaki Naomi and "Chio-chan no Tsuugakuro"as Nonomura Manana
description: She may not have many roles over the past decade, but you'll recognise her coarse yet lovely voice from a mile away. Her personality outside of Anime is even better than her roles, as she gets older her allure[2] presented from her Instagram photos will attract you to her more than ever.
comments: [1]Fans call her "Omichu",but I think she is too matured to have such nicknames; She has a Chinese nickname read as "Xiao Qian Ji"as in "Little Chiaki Princess"
[2]I have reviewed a photobook(?) from Anime "Bungou Stray Dogs"original{novel-based recital event} and I think you'll understand her eroticism without me explaining it

name: Oonishi Saori
intro: From Game "Eromanga-sensei"as Senjuu Muramasa, and later in Game "Dead or Alive:Venus Vacation"as Tamaki
description: This is another one of those "your friend's hotter than you"and being on the same video series as{Minase Inori}[2] it's not hard to notice a difference. Oonishi exudes a playful yet matured personality, making her an absolute talent outside of Anime[3]. Inside of Anime, it's when she potrays matured characters (see above roles) that makes her stand out.
comments: [1]I typically refer to her by her family name, but more commonly referred to as "Saorin"

[2]From live video series off Anime "Re:Zero"with{Minase Inori} "Minase Inori to Oonishi Saori no Pick Up Girls!"where they just hang around to chat in 10-minute videos, which eventually made them close friends
[3]Through several YouTube videos featuring her radop show with{Sakura Ayane} where they just flirt around and win the Anime Radio Awards while they're at it

name: Oono Yuuko
intro: From Game "Alternative Girls"as Beruru
description: Her roles do stand out to be very different from her in person, because this inherent cuteness flowing out within her is hard to resist. If she ever out-cutes her own voice in an Anime role I think I'll die of overdose. She is a really good definition of what kawaii is in Japan without even acting. In Anime, she has been given opportunities to perform even cool characters[2].
comments: [1]Retired as of October 2024
[2]She was the main character for Anime "Mahou Shoujo Site"

name: Oozora Naomi
intro: From Game "Alternative Girls"as Tachibana Naomi and later in Anime "Chio-chan no Tsuugakuro"as Miyamo Chio
description: Despite her age and late entrance into the Anime industry, she excels cutely in roles involving her Osaka hometown accent[2]. Outside Anime she presents a lively personality and subtle awkwardness that is to love.
comments: [1]More commonly referred to as "SoraSora"
[2]Examples I know include mobile game "Alternative Girls",and as Kanna in desktop video game "Dead or Alive:Venus Vacation"
[3]From her marriage announcement post on social media, she talked about how she met someone on the streets a year ago who saved her life and... everything else is history

name: Toyota Moe
intro: From Itou Miku and their idol unit Pyxis
description: She's like that friend's friend who is more attractive than your friend lol (sorry Itou Miku no offense). She is not as popular in roles though, but her roles do present her as being idol-like, not that I've given any of them though. Without much Anime credit I am refraining my idolism on her tbh but she is irresistably cute[3].
comments: [1]Part of idol unit Pyxis with fellow voice actress Itou Miku; Solo debut album released in 2023 for her 10th year of being a voice actress where she sings cover songs and originals
[2]I bought and reviewed all her solo and group photobooks with Itou Miku in bikini- NO I DID NOT haha
[3]If you followed her Twitter and Instagram and don't think she's dating you, you need to follow harder lol

name: Waki Azumi
intro: From Anime "Blend.S"as Sakuranomiya Maika, and later in Anime "Midara na Ao-chan wa Benkyou ga Dekinai"as Horie Ao
description: Her many appealing selfies is proof of how good she can take photos alone, and I can't help myself but be interested in her. In terms of voice hers is not exactly unique but it is good and she is seen in a variety of roles and she excels in all of them[3].
comments: [1]Under music label Nippon Columbia from 2020 to 2023
[2]I have reviewed her 1st photobook without any swimsuits, such a pity
[3]She was chosen as a replacement voice in Game "Alternative Girls"as Mizushima Airi, taking over from retired voice actress Endou Yurika

name: Yoshimura Haruka
intro: From Game "Alternative Girls"as Orimiya Yui, and later in Anime "Domestic na Kanojo"as Kashiwabara Momo
description: Her personality is lovely despite her really compelling voice acting using her higher pitched cute voice, so for me it's mostly how she expresses herself very amicably outside of Anime that makes her stand out.
comments: [1]Fans guess she's in her 30s before her marriage announcement, so maybe born in late 1980s- HOLY SHIT she is old haha
[2]She does post on her blog images of herself at the beach in a swimsuit, and I wouldn't even count that

name: Aizawa Saya
intro: From Anime "Taishou Otome Otogibanashi"as Tachibana Yuzuki, and later in Anime "Engage Kiss"as Kisara
description: She sounds like the girl next door we would otherwise miss, because her voicing cute characters (especially when I found out it was from a series years ago) has not been disappointing, and her somewhat straight-faced character in front of the camera[3] is rubbing off on me so why not, I like her image way too much than I expected.
comments: [1]More commonly referred to as "Sacchan"or "Sa-yan"
[2]She does sing for Anime though, in an example{she covered a song} as an Anime character in "Engage Kiss"
[3]She hosts a{fortnightly livestream series} where she just has good food and drinks and replies to fan mails (which is ending soon due to her poor health)

name: Ishihara Kaori
intro: From Anime "Nagi no Asu Kara"as Hisanuma Sayu and later in Anime "Hige wo Soru. Soshite Joshikousei wo Hirou."as Mishima Yuzuha and singing the Anime's ending theme song
description: I wouldn't say she is my type, but her image comes off as plenty attractive even with a tinge of cuteness, so I'll take this same year girl along with her beautiful singing[3]. Inside of Anime, she does have a distinctive voice hard to miss, but I don't hear her too often so I have to try harder to find them (and her).
comments: [1]Named after her middle school idol, Anime movie "Paradise Kiss"main character nicknamed Caroline; Her nickname has been the short form of that ever since
[2]She has been in many idol groups over the years mainly with Ogura Yui; For her solo music career, she is under music label PONY CANYON since 2018 but I've technically only known her since 2021
[3]I reviewed her single from 2023, a spectacular showcase of her singing cool and love songs

name: Kanno Mai
intro: From the introductory livestream of Anime "IDOLY PRIDE"because she's cute
description: Initially she didn't even catch my attention, but as I see her on social media more often and thanks to her Instagram lives where she sings acapella karaoke[3], she only got more adorable in my impression. At this point, she has convinced me to sign up for her Niconico channel for monthly livestreams, and made me stay up at midnight to listen to her weekly radio show. She is the new embodiment of cuteness and the furthest I have went to supporting an idol voice actress.
comments: [1]Due to her associating vocabulary with her name? Fans do refer to her as "Kanma-chan"as an abbreviation to her name
[2]She did release a photobook where she goes to Okinawa, thanks to her Niconico channel

[3]You can only catch this live she only archives those streams for at most 24 hours so I can't show you any examples apart from some clips she posts afterwards; You gotta follow her Instagram now to see it live

name: Naganawa Maria
intro: From Game "Alternative Girls"as Usui Miyuki, and later in Anime "Joshikousei no Mudazukai"as Momoi Saku
comments: [1]Under Lantis since announcement during her birthday in 2025

name: Nakashima Yuki
intro: From Anime "Gimai Seikatsu"as Ayase Saki, or earlier from her singing theme ending theme song of Anime "Kawaii Dake Janai Shikimori-san"
comments: [1]Under NBCUniversal since 2020
[2]I reviewed her photobook in 2025 where she goes to western Australia

name: Ogura Yui
intro: From Anime "Tsurezure Children"as Kamine Ayaka and singing the Anime's ending theme song, though I may have heard of her as early as Anime "OreImo"as Kuroneko's younger sister
description: Maybe putting her by association to Tamura Yukari's voice might be doing her a deficit, because even after all these years singing cute songs and sounding cute in Anime overall, she still can surprise me with her voice acting[3] once in a while, and that's real cool in my opinion. Outside of Anime, she is quite a trouper for fanservice, which makes her quite a lovely idol indeed.
comments: [1]She has been in many idol groups over the years mainly with Ishihara Kaori; Solo-wise, she has been in KING AMUSEMENT CREATIVE since I knew of her back in 2017; Today she is under music label Nippon Columbia
[2]She has done a lot of swimsuit fanservice in the past whether in groups or alone, but I have only reviewed her photobook released in 2024 mainly because it featured my home country Singapore
[3]Notable deviations from her usual voice acting include Sanae in Anime "Takagi-san"series and Yamamoto in Anime "RikeKoi"series

name: Sakura Ayane
intro: From "Tsurezure Children"as Kaji Ryouko, and "Houseki no Kuni"as Bort
description: She might be the one of the most popular and dotable voice actress as far as I have watched Anime. Ironically, she has only caught my attention in Anime through cooler roles[2], which then quickly transformed into my desires for wanting to hear her doing straight roles[3] in comedy series, as she is the embodiment of comedy herself. Doubt I need to explain what she is outside Anime after all, she has shown us her everything as honest and pure as she has been.
comments: [1]She did release a photobook before though without swimsutis, and I hear the bed scene is more than enough to- Don't make me mention that she flashed her (flat) chest in front of the camera in her Instagram lives when she started that in 2023 just to show her make-up
[2]A popular example would be her voicing Gabi in the "Attack on Titan"series, and those that I came to know of her from back in 2017

[3]As in{"tsukkomi"}, defined as the straight person in a duo of comedy banter; The culprit role for me was her voicing Kakei Ami in Anime "Kakushigoto"which just sounds like her IRL in banter with others

name: Sasaki Nao
intro: From mobile game "IDOLY PRIDE"as Saeki Haruko
description: She has all the allure despite me knowing nothing much about her. Her voice acting is more on the deep voice side as with her normal voice, so that is surely not what I fell in love with. Despite that, she still has a certain image which is for many to envy, and I suppose everything else is falling in place quite well.
comments: [1]Hard to not confuse her with Touyama Nao if not for their own nickname, members in "IDOLY PRIDE"and I suppose fans call her "Naosu"
[2]Does singing in an idol-based mobile game and Anime count?

name: Suganuma Chisa
intro: From her hanging out with{Isobe Karin}, and from her Niconico livestream series
description: Thanks to Niconico being hacked and recovering for a couple of months, many livestream series were not only moved to YouTube temporarily but also offered for free, and that was when I started watching her livestream series which literally wanted us to "fall in love with her". Between her voicing roles I hear in "THE IDOLM@STER:SHINY COLORS"and that double tooth, I think I can like her more.
comments: [1]She is in L'Antica, an all-girls singing group in video game series "THE IDOLM@STER:SHINY COLORS"
[2]I have reviewed her TWO photobooks in 2025 where she went to Singapore, after seeing{a walking YouTube Short}

name: Takao Kanon
intro: From Anime "Tantei wa Mou, Shindeiru."as Saikawa Yui and mobile game "IDOLY PRIDE"as Shiraishi Chisa
comments: [1]She is an active member of Ave Mujica as keyboardist, which explains{her exceptional piano skill}

name: Tomita Miyu
intro: From Anime "Joshikousei no Mudazukai"as Yamamoto Minami and "Houkago Saikoro Club"as Oono Midori
description: Her roles in Anime have been impressive as I have seen a few till date, but outside of Anime she is a total millennia having a picky appetite, nonchalant in reactions[3], and is cool and even sometimes cute overall. It's hard to not be interested in her. Her boyish image is covering up her childish yet innocent personality.
comments: [1]As influenced from an Anime "JoshiMuda"livestream where veteran Okitsu Kazuyuki fanboys on her also promoting her as a then newbie shouting "MIYU-CHAN!!"
[2]Under music label Nippon Columbia since 2019 where her debut single was for Anime "Houkago Saikoro Club"
[3]For example, in a YouTube video where fellow talent company member{Funato Yurie tries to prank her}, Miyu-chan has shown to not freak out under an electric shock pen and cockroaches

name: Tsuda Minami
intro: From Anime "Fractale"as Phryne, and later in Game "Dead or Alive Extreme:Venus Vacation"as Misaki
description: I think I've known her for too long, my love for her has only grown every so little over the years. But I stil think I'm into her than ever before, with her slightly coarse and adorable voice acting, it's always a joy to hear her in Anime once in a while. The lipstick selfies[2] are just fuel for desire to kiss her, by the way.
comments: [1]I regret never reviewing her only photobook because damn if you did not realize how stacked she was in that, you will never think otherwise
[2]Due to overwhelming response from fans, her Twitter account now posts so many selfies of her showing what lipstick she used to the extent one would easily misunderstand otherwise

name: Ueda Reina
intro: From "Majo no Tabitabi"as Doll Store Owner, or earlier from voice actress Takahashi Rie from podcast series "ShigoHaji"
description: Over the years I kept referring her to as "the other Kana-chan"due to the similarity in voice but I feel like as I know her more she is very chill, surprisingly feminine, exhibiting a different type of aura than I would have imagined, and I've grown to like that a lot more with her solo artist songs compared to her voice acting roles.
comments: [1]Under Lantis since 2016, but I've only known her since 2020 with a single B-side "{Hana no Ame}",and she only continued to impress me with her 2021 album and 2022 mini-album
[2]She has released a photobook about artwork and her which you might expect, featured less of her but more of famous works of art

name: Yamane Aya
intro: From livestream series "YayaTomiNo"with Tomita Miyu
comments: [1]Under own label YAYA RECORDS and YouTube channel where she uploads song covers, with her first solo EP released April 2024

name: Youmiya Hina
intro: From Anime "Sono Bisque Doll wa Koi wo Suru"as Inui Shinjuu, and later in Anime "Shoushimin Series"as Osanai Yuki
comments: [1]She is in the "BanG Dream!"series as the vocalist of all-girls band MyGO!!!!!

name: Yukimura Eri
intro: From Game "Dead or Alive:Venus Vacation"as Monica, and later in Anime "Warau Arsonotia Sun!"as Picatrix
comments: [1]I reviewed her 1st photobook released in 2024 with swimsuits to please on her trip to Okinawa
